title: Europe’s competitive edge lies in providing truly sovereign cloud solutions [Promoted Content]
summary_full: True cloud sovereignty means European providers maintain technological, jurisdictional and operational control—not just data residency. Broadcom invests in European cloud partners, providing enabling technology to strengthen the local industrial base and deliver competitive, sovereign solutions without building everything from scratch.
